usage: discosync [-h] [-v] [-t {dropbox,webdav,d,w}] [-b | -r | -s]

the DiscoDOS backup & sync tool.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -v, --verbose         increase log verbosity (-v -> INFO level, -vv DEBUG
                        level)
  -t {dropbox,webdav,d,w}, --type {dropbox,webdav,d,w}
                        select synchronisation type: dropbox (default) or
                        webdav; or just in short: d or w
  -b, --backup
  -r, --restore
  -s, --show
